email_chain.subject: Offer for Wheat Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I hope this message finds you well. We have the MV OCEAN STAR available for your wheat shipment from Houston to Shanghai. Vessel details: DWT 75000, LOA 225m. Freight rate is $45/MT CFR. Laycan 1-5 October. Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
Michael Anderson

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Wheat Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Thanks for the offer. The rate seems a bit high. Can you do $40/MT? Also, can you confirm the loading window and demurrage rate?

Best,
Sarah Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Wheat Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Loading window is 72 hours, demurrage $15,000/day. Best I can do is $42/MT. Let me know.

Best regards,
Michael Anderson

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Wheat Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Thanks for the update. Let's proceed. Please send the recap.

Best,
Sarah Carter

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Recap - Wheat Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Please find recap below:
- Commodity: Wheat
- Cargo Size: 50000MT
- Load Port: Houston
- Disch Port: Shanghai
- Freight Rate: USD 42/MT CFR
- Laycan: 1-5 October
- Demurrage: $15,000/day

Let me know if any corrections needed.

Best regards,
Michael Anderson

email_chain.subject: Re: Recap - Wheat Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Everything looks good. Please proceed with the booking.

Best,
Sarah Carter
